General.Name: Cs Holdings
General.Description: CS Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets welding materials in Korea. The company's products include stick electrodes, flux cored wires, submerged arcs, mag wires, mig wires, tig cut lengths, and oxyacetylene electrodes. It serves shipbuilding, offshore, construction, oil and gas, nuclear energy, fabrication, and automobile industries. The company was formerly known as Chosun Welding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CS Holdings Co., Ltd. in January 2010. CS Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea.
